snippet: Among the security measures at the Kentucky Derby were the use of electronic wands to scan some spectators for weapons, a reinstated ban on coolers and limits on the size of fans’ purses.
abstract: Among the security measures at the Kentucky Derby were the use of electronic wands to scan some spectators for weapons, a reinstated ban on coolers and limits on the size of fans’ purses.

headline.main: Bombings at Marathon Lead to Tighter Security
headline.print_headline: Bombings at Marathon Lead to Tighter Security
